CIRCULAR NO . 16 /  2003 
 
 
 
Sub: Security check of employees who have been  issued airport entry passes 
for their legitimate functions at the airports in the country. 
 
 
It has come to notice that certain officials who have been issued airport 
entry passes for carrying out their legitimate functions at the airports in the 
country are not subjected to prescribed security checks while entering restricted / 
airside areas.  
 
It is hereby clarified that all employees working at airports, holding airport 
entry passes for their legitimate functions shall be frisked and their belongings 
searched before being allowed to enter restricted areas of the airport.  
 
No persons other than those who have been exempted from pre-
embarkation security check in accordance with Circular No. 12/2002 dated 
1.5.2002 are exempted from security checks while gaining entry to the restricted 
area of the airport either on the authority of airport pass or passenger ticket. 
 
 
 
(R.K.  Singh) 
Addl. Commissioner of  Security (CA) 
 
Ref : No. CAS-10(3) 2003-Div-1  dated 16 June 2003
